channel.title: Need help wit posting
channel.description: okay huge problem here .. why wont moparscape let me post my server ?? it always says its offline but i portfoward right and i use my no-ip right i even did this exact tut and nothing happend still look -http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,379865.0.html and stioll nothing it still said offline and could register....... so please can anyone please help me ive been trying 2 figure this out for 2 weeks now :mad: :mad: :mad: wow this been up 4 30 mins and no comment wow thnx guys :confused: :confused: :confused:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2009, 08:37:30 pm[/size][hr]14 veiws and no post lmfao

item.title: Need help wit posting

item.description:

i have a yahoo… and i did check 40mins ago…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2010, 09:56:35 pm[/size][hr]some1 help please ugh!! :eek:

item.title: Need help wit posting
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

ok but did you check? You keep being persistant that you did it all even tho you have not checked thats show that you just want attention and don’t care for an answer.If you have msn?if so my email is in my profile(MSN) contact me there and click activites and click request remote assistance

Read full topic

item.title: Need help wit posting
item.dc:creator: @i_str8merk_i i str8merk i
item.description:
@i_str8merk_i wrote:

okay sory but i did all that im, not lying i did everything u said!!!): still does not work[quote=“imsokool22, post:6, topic:323295”]@ i str8merk i, I doubt you did that all man that’s why it isn’t working if u did then your server would of been up by now and don’t be rude by say"I did that all duh".Get some manners before you come back and say something that is rude again.ON-TOPIC: Make sure you check your firewall exceptions to see if u add an except for 43594 TCP.Then check that your router is portforwarded to your ip of your pc(the one your hosting your server on). FYI: Being rude or not explaining something clear enough is why you get no response because people read the stuff you type and when you don’t write clearly then people cant understand and wont respond to your post.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help wit posting
item.dc:creator: @imsokool22 imsokool22
item.description:
@imsokool22 wrote:

@ i str8merk i, I doubt you did that all man that’s why it isn’t working if u did then your server would of been up by now and don’t be rude by say"I did that all duh".Get some manners before you come back and say something that is rude again.ON-TOPIC: Make sure you check your firewall exceptions to see if u add an except for 43594 TCP.Then check that your router is portforwarded to your ip of your pc(the one your hosting your server on). FYI: Being rude or not explaining something clear enough is why you get no response because people read the stuff you type and when you don’t write clearly then people cant understand and wont respond to your post.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help wit posting
item.dc:creator: @i_str8merk_i i str8merk i
item.description:
@i_str8merk_i wrote:

i did all that duh[quote=“Kingen50cent, post:2, topic:323295”]Dude theres no comments because theres no solution for your problem.
I’m 100% That you haven’t portforwarded or opened ports in the firewall yet.
Try to let your friend connect to your server and see if it’s online lol. [b]because it isn’t moparscape server status list’s fault if it were it’s fault then there would be thousands of people complaining! :D[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 01, 2010, 12:49:31 am[/size][hr]22 veiws and 1 reply -.-

Dude theres no comments because theres no solution for your problem.
I’m 100% That you haven’t portforwarded or opened ports in the firewall yet.
